featured.text: Out of and consideration, I always write a thank-you note when someone sends me a gift.
Of course, in determining overall standards of living of Americans, factors __(40)__ household composition and family size need also to be taken into consideration.

definition.zh_def: 考慮；體貼；關心他人感受的行為或態度
definition.en_def: Careful thought, typically over a period of time, or a factor to be taken into account.
definition.example: She showed great consideration for her friend's feelings.
